news_header: Metso's turnover fell by five percent, but the order book increased by 13 percent from October to December. Net sales decreased to EUR 1.27 billion, and adjusted operating profit declined from EUR 225 million last year.
news_original_title: Metso paransi tilauskantaansa, mutta liikevaihto laski
news_text: Managing Director Sami Takaluoma expressed satisfaction with the order book growth despite a weaker market last year. The Board proposes a dividend of EUR 0.38 to be paid in two installments.
